name: CanCELLed - English
description:
'CanCELLed' is a short, educational demo that aims to teach about the messy mechanics behind Cancer.

Messy Mechanics

Dr. Clearcell has invited you to a training day at the cell factory, where you will learn how to deal with faulty cells on the conveyor belt!

In 'CanCELLed' your job is to sort through the cells that are produced on the conveyor belt and target faulty cells that have become cancerous! Dr. Clearcell will help you to understand what type of cancer has formed and it is your duty to choose the correct treatment!

Who's behind CanCELLed?
  • Lewis Moholt | Team Lead, Programmer, Level Design, Animation, Sound Effects. @LinkedIn | @Website | @YouTube
  • Jessicca Hornby | Programmer. @LinkedIn
  • Lu Gossian | Graphics Artist. @LinkedIn
  • Amy Francis  | Subject Matter Expert. @LinkedIn
  • Pavithra Hatharasinghe | 3D Artist. @LinkedIn
  • Wafi Bedewi | Programmer. @LinkedIn | @Website

And the organizers of the JAMtheMESS game jam (Giusy Tornillo, Karen Reed, Fiona Caroll, Glenn Jenkins), a project funded by Wellcome Trust and a collaboration between Cardiff University and Cardiff Metropolitan University.

Controls (Mouse) Feedback/Bug Reports

CanCELLed is still in a development state. If you have 5 minutes spare and would like to provide us with your invaluable feedback or bug reports, please report them using the following link: https://forms.gle/yEV32UGayKTcziG58

Want to play CanCELLed in Welsh? Click the link below!

https://jamthemess.itch.io/cancelled-welsh

Thank you for playing!
